Hi Christian,

The problem was indeed the String[] that I submitted as para=
meter.
Using new String[] {"-a", "password"} everything works fine.

Thanks=
 a lot for your help!

Nathalie


--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, C=
hristian Krumm
<signore.chrissi@...> wrote:
>

owing code works for me on my Ubuntu Linux machine.

by accessing

[] {"-a password"} you are useing.

> Christian
